reviews.comment: Beautiful courts with excellent lighting. Staff is very friendly and helpful.
Great facilities, but can get crowded on weekends. Courts are well-maintained.
Love playing here! The surface is perfect and the location is convenient.
Decent courts but the parking situation could be better.
Good value for money. Courts are clean and well-kept.
Courts are okay but the nets need replacing. Staff wasn't very responsive.
Nice outdoor courts with great views. Perfect for evening games.
Courts are decent but the lighting could be improved for night play.

name: Central Park Tennis Center
address: 1234 Central Park West, New York, NY 10024

reviews.comment: Amazing location right in Central Park! Courts are pristine and the atmosphere is unbeatable.
Great courts but expensive. Worth it for the location though.
Good courts but very busy. Hard to get a reservation during peak hours.
Well-maintained courts with professional staff. Love the park setting.
Overpriced for what you get. Courts are fine but nothing special.
Perfect courts in the heart of the city. Can't beat this location!
Decent facilities but the booking system is confusing.
Beautiful courts with great views of the park. Highly recommend!
Excellent coaching staff and top-notch facilities. Best tennis experience in Austin!
Great courts and lessons. My game has improved significantly since joining.
Good facilities but the membership fees are quite high.
Outstanding courts and professional atmosphere. Love the tournaments they host.
Courts are okay but the customer service needs improvement.
